Html:
Hello,

Code used:

IExcelDataReader excelReader = null;

int row_no = 1;

FileStream excelStream = File.Open(path_excel, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read);            excelReader = ExcelReaderFactory.CreateBinaryReader(excelStream);               

DataSet result = excelReader.AsDataSet();


I wonder if anyone has a clue how to solve this?


Thankful.


Leandro
